plot: Ken Burns examines the American utopian 19th century religious sect known as the Shakers.
title: The Shakers: Hands to Work, Hearts to God

original_name: The Shakers: Hands to Work, Hearts to God
plot_en: Ken Burns examines the American utopian 19th century religious sect known as the Shakers.
